reviewDescription: This speaker rocks! The balance struck between clear vocals, engaging mids and shocking bass is surprising at this price. What JBL? This brand has the capability to reshape the audio landscape.Let's start with the benefits. Firstly, for iPhone and Windows users, this supports AAC codec, which means superior audio quality as compared to SBC codecs found in most other speakers in this price range. Secondly, a dedicated equaliser button with three presets of your choosing (using the app) is a godsend when using it for different purposes and genres. Thirdly, and this was my decision making factor, the sound quality. My god is it good! Distortion free at high volumes, enough bass to fill a small room, comparable to a Bose Soundlink Mini which my uncle has, makes it the default choice for someone who has a sound quality as their most important criteria. Fourthly, the battery is absolutely mind blowing. Listening at around 60-70% volume for almost 2-3 hours daily makes me have to charge it only once a week.The only negative I found was that when paired in stereo with another speaker, the sound doesn't necessarily become twice as much, if that makes sense. I don't know whose issue that is, but sort of the only naggle have.I have not thoroughly tested the speaker though, for example in my 6 months of owning it I have never used an AUX cable, but for my use case it fits perfectly. I can take this sound anywhere, be it trips on the weekend or to chill with friends after class, perfect for jam sessions in the hostel, so safe to say I can wholeheartedly recommend this to anyone looking for THE BEST SPEAKER under 5000.

Tribit xsound +2 is a wonderful product. Elegant and simple design, very good bass and treble output, nice vocals quality, amazing battery backup, app support with custom equalizer settings and firmware update support  are great and standout features  of this speaker. It's a real value for money product.

     I’ve been using the Tribit XSound Plus 2 for the past three months, and it has truly exceeded my expectations. The sound quality is impressive, with excellent bass for its price range.Loudness for this good for me in room or for a small picnic , its fine.Its not very party speaker outdoor but gets the job done.The ability to customize the EQ through the app is a fantastic feature, allowing me to tailor the audio to my liking. Xbass is good but may consume more battery. Additionally, Tribit’s customer service has been outstanding.Volume control is good. Waterproof is sure as it has good ipx rating even though i didn't tested.Battery life is awesome.Once charged it last me almost a week and still have 10% (without xbass).Connectivity is good in mobiles but in there is a bit lag when connected via Bluetooth to the computer and it can be solved using a 3.5m cable Overall, this speaker offers great value and performance, and I’m very satisfied with my purchase.

reviewTitle: A very impressive sounding speaker at this price!!!
reviewDescription: This speaker definitely sounds very good for the price. I got it during the sale period which was an even more amazing deal. Ok let me sum up what liked and disliked.1) Build quality is good and rugged. Not tested the IP rating yet but using it near a water source won't be a problem.2) The battery life is very good assuming you are using it at 60% to 70% volume.3) The sound quality has two sides. What is good of the sound  is the overall quality. It's easy to get the highs and mids to sound good but the tricky part is the lows. The bass overall sounds loud and punchy and sounded quite good on most of the songs i tried. But where it falls short is in the really low deep bass that is very difficult to reproduce at this price point. And it's best to use only the default bass setting ie the xsound bass mode, tweaking the equaliser for more deep bass only makes it crack at higher volume. I really like deep bass and since i have always had big speaker setups, i enjoy the deep bass that the bose soundlink mini 2 produces.  Having said that, this tribit speaker is very impressive from the point of it's size and price.

     I didn't expect this to be so good. The sound quality is excellent. Especially at low to medium volume it performs and sounds really well. It can truly fill a small sized room with stunning, almost wall shaking sound. At high volume though it produces a lot of treble which might be a bit irritating. The bass quality is good although it can be overpowering sometimes when the Xbass is on. I'm using my own custom EQ as shown in the attached images to handle the extreme bass and treble. It works quite well with all songs. The battery backup is decent although it doesn't last 24 hrs as claimed. But it's good enough for me as I listen occasionally. Overall a good buy. I got it at around 4.5k. I will update this review after 5-6 months.

reviewDescription: One of the best purchased all the aspects are great sound quality, built quality, battery backup,Easy to carry.Thank you amazon to deliver it so safely.

The sound quality of the Tribit speaker is exceptional. I've been using it since 2021, but unfortunately, it is no longer working. Although service support isn't available in India, I reached out to the support team. They kindly offered a discount on a new purchase via email, even though my product was out of warranty. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for great sound quality and reliable support from the Tribit team.Thank you!

     This speaker is amazing for indoor listening I have used tribit xsound go. But this is much better than that speaker it doesn't have significantly louder audio but you can notice the difference instantly also this speaker has much better bass and fills the space with audio in much better way in comparison to tribit xsound go. It's build quality is amazing you can throw it at window or something and nothing will happen to this speaker.The audio clarity is really good up until 80% after that there is a bit of distortion but you might notice it as it's not something that everyone will be able to pick up. At 100% there is drop in bass and the vocals and treble seem to dominate but still it sounds pretty good but if you are wondering if you can use this speaker outside or not i would say there are bigger speakers you can buy if you want to listen outside. As this is a small speaker you will feel the bass is not enough for outside environment.Other than that for home listening this is one of the best in this price range.Plus use only SBC audio codec in bluetooth settings AAC doesn't work that good as it reduces volume so SBC is the best codec for this speaker.

Just go for it if your usage is just indoorsIt will make you feel like a home theatre.. for only indoors.. at 80% volume. But above that it might break the bass. Buletoorh connectivity is good. Build quality is very very good. And its easily usable battery life is also very good and the sound quality is also usper.

reviewTitle: Certainly! Here's a review for a good bass and HD Bluetooth speaker:
reviewDescription: **Impressive Bass:** This Bluetooth speaker truly stands out for its powerful bass. Whether you're playing hip-hop, EDM, or any bass-heavy genre, the low-end frequencies come through with depth and clarity. The bass is punchy without being overwhelming, delivering a rich listening experience.**HD Sound Quality:** The speaker offers excellent sound quality with crisp highs and balanced mids. Even at higher volumes, the sound remains clear and distortion-free. It's perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, filling any space with immersive audio.**Portable and Durable:** The speaker's design is sleek and portable, making it easy to carry around. It's built with durable materials that feel sturdy, ensuring it can withstand the rigors of daily use, whether at home or on the go.**Long Battery Life:** One of the standout features is its impressive battery life. It can easily last up to 15 hours on a single charge, making it ideal for long trips, parties, or outdoor activities without needing frequent recharging.**Seamless Bluetooth Connectivity:** Pairing the speaker with devices is a breeze, thanks to its reliable Bluetooth connection. It maintains a strong connection even at a distance, allowing you to move freely without worrying about losing the signal.- **Size:** While the speaker is portable, it might be a bit bulky for some users who are looking for something more compact. However, this trade-off is worth it for the sound quality it deliver

reviewTitle: So far the best Tribit bluetooth speaker ever released
reviewDescription: Size  -  very compact, look and build quality top notch equal to 10 to 15k bluetooth speaker.Weight - for small size speaker it feels heafty around 600 grams.Battery backup - it takes 2 hour 35 mins to lose 10 percentage power, (played songs 50% volume with Xbass ON). (Really good battery backup) It has 4800 mah battery pack. (Around 4 hours to full charge)Sound quality : for price this Xsound plus 2 is UNDOUBTEDLY BEST IS ENTIRE 10K PRICE SEGMENT, ALSO EQUAL TO JBL FLIP 6, ONLY FLIP 6 HAS MORE BASS THAN THIS.BASS QUALITY : THIS HAS VERY DEEP BASS NOT LOUD BUT, DEPTH IS REALLY UNBELIEVABLE FOR ITS SIZE 🔥🔥🔥🔥MIDS/VOCALS - INSTRUMENTS SOUNDS CAN CLEARLY SEPERATED, SOMEHOW TRIBIT FIND HOW TO ENHANCE VOICE IN AUDIO LIKE JBL. (VOCALS ARE EXACTLY GOOD AS JBL QUALITY, INFACT BETTER THAN JBL)HIGHS/TREBLE - TRIBIT DONE A MAGIC IS TREBLE DEPARTMENT. ULTRA LEVEL CLARITY FEELS LIKE DOLBY AUDIO. 😲NOTE : TRIBIT XSOUND PLUS 2 HAS AAC CODEC SUPPORT AND B.T VERSION 5.3 . SO IF YOUR MOBILE HAS BT 5.3 AND ACC CODEC ENABLED IF WILL FEEL REAL EFFECT OF THIS SPEAKER.IF THERE IS CONS IN THIS SPEAKER IS THAT IT DON'T HAVE SERVICE CENTRES IN INDIA. GO ONLY IF U ARE WILLING TO GET POSSIBLY THE BEST BLUETOOTH SPEAKER IN PRICE SEGMENT, BUT KEEP IN MIND IF ANYTHING WENT WRONG WITH SPEAKER YOU ON YOUR OWN. (TRIBIT MAY REPLACE BT SPEAKER INCASE MALFUNCTION THAT TOO IF ITS UNDER WARRANTY) OR ELSE AMAZON IS NOT RETURNING MONEY. ONLY REPLACEMENT.I WILL UPDATE THIS REVIEW AFTER 1 WEEK WITH VIDEO SAMLES.I HOPE IT ANSWERED YOUR QUESTIONS TO SPEAKERFILES PEOPLE.

Hence, returned it and ordered 'Earfun UBoom L' and it was perfect for me. It's ranked no. 1 on speakerranking.com small-med sized speakers.
